function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced hours and restricted services in the dining industry, including food trucks, may have increased congestion and close interactions among customers during peak hours, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and infection among customers and workers in the food truck industry.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, controlling crowd sizes, and promoting contactless service options to minimize close interactions and congestion.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, online ordering platforms, and crowd management tools.","People":"Customers, food truck workers, and other individuals in close proximity to the food truck.","Owner":"Food truck owners and operators, local health authorities, and regulatory agencies."}]}
